name: Franco Sarto
description:
Here we have a pair of penny loafers by Franco Sarto in a Women's Size 6.5 M.
 These shoes are navy blue featuring soft pebbled leather, block heels, a pointed toe, and are slip-on.
 They measure about 10.25 heel to toe, 3.75 across the ball of the foot, 3.5 from the bottom of the heel to the top of the shoe, and a 1 heel. 
 These shoes were made in Vietnam with a leather upper and a synthetic insole/lining. 
 They come to you in very good pre-owned condition with a small scuff on the toe of the left shoe. Gently used. See photo.
